availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Christian County and Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth Terrell Dismukes. Father of Alpheus P. Dismukes, Zachary Dismukes, John C. Dismukes, Walter E. Dismukes, Ella Dismukes, and Sidney Dismukes. Farmer in Christian County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, p. 95.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, , Ballard County, Lovelaceville District, p. 7.
